channel.title: Chat filter? Think it's possible?
channel.description: I'd like to add something that blocks out words like RuneScape, since the people can't handle cursing on my server, can someone help me a little on this?

item.title: Chat filter? Think it's possible?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:14, topic:237507”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=313586.msg2496076#msg2496076 date=1224406846]

it would be something along the lines of…

String[] badwords =
{
"bitch", "fuck", "pussy", etc...
};

int wordlength = word.length();

String replacementStars = "";
for(int stars = 0; stars < wordlength; stars++)
{
replacementStars.concat("*");
}

if(String.contains(word))
{
String.replaceAll(word, replacementStars);
}

The client handles it client-sided you twat.
[/quote]

yeah, i know. in the client, find the method that prints the message, or w/e you want to call it. i couldn’t remember what it’s called so i just said String.[/quote]
It was removed when moparisthebest re-factored (poorly) a 317 deob.

[quote=“X Screech X, post:13, topic:237507”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=313586.msg2495964#msg2495964 date=1224399955]
This is without a doubt the most idiotic thing I have ever witnessed.
[/quote]
Ok, that’s fine. I’m sure you never asked questions two years ago… This community is falling apart because of people like you. Thank you for all the positive help. I really appreciate it. ;).[/quote]
It’s falling apart because of people like you who don’t do a little bit of research before asking questions, I am sure if you would look through a client you would find it.

Read full topic

item.title: Chat filter? Think it's possible?
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Example:

class jabafile
{

public void bad words
Word 1 Word 2 Word 3

}

Is that right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 18, 2008, 11:55:23 pm[/size][hr]Also, how do I add this in? Or can I make a .java file? What would that be named?
